item.title: GitHub Pages and GitHub Actions
item.description: GitHub Actions for GitHub Pages GitHub Actions for GitHub Pages üöÄ Deploy static files and publish your site with Static Site Generators peaceiris/actions-gh-pages This is a GitHub Action to deploy your static files to GitHub Pages. This deploy action can be combined simply and freely with Static Site Generators (Hugo, mdBook, MkDocs, Gatsby, GitBook, etc.). - name:Deployuses:peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v2env:ACTIONS_DEPLOY_KEY:${{secrets.ACTIONS_DEPLOY_KEY}}PUBLISH_BRANCH:gh-pagesPUBLISH_DIR:./publicThe above example step will deploy ./public directory to gh-pages branch.
